sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Table, Modal, Form, Tab, Tabs } from "react-bootstrap" import { courseService, userService } from "../services/api" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" const InstructorDashboard = () => { const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]) const [stats, setStats] = useState({}) const [showCourseModal, setShowCourseModal] = useState(false) const [editingCourse, setEditingCourse] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const { user } = useAuth() const [courseForm, setCourseForm] = useState({ title: "", description: "", mediaUrl: "", }) useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData() }, []) const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { const [coursesResponse, statsResponse] = await Promise.all([ courseService.getInstructorCourses(), userService.getInstructorStats(), ]) setCourses(coursesResponse.data) setStats(statsResponse.data) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard data:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleCourseSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { if (editingCourse) { await courseService.updateCourse(editingCourse.courseId, courseForm) } else { await courseService.createCourse(courseForm) } setShowCourseModal(false) setCourseForm({ title: "", description: "", mediaUrl: "" }) setEditingCourse(null) fetchDashboardData() } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving course:", error) } } const handleEditCourse = (course) => { setEditingCourse(course) setCourseForm({ title: course.title, description: course.description, mediaUrl: course.mediaUrl || "", }) setShowCourseModal(true) } const handleDeleteCourse = async (courseId) => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this course?")) { try { await courseService.deleteCourse(courseId) fetchDashboardData() } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting course:", error) } } } if (loading) { return (
Loading...
) } return (

) : ( {courses.map((course) => ( ))}

{course.description?.substring(0, 50)}...
{course.enrolledStudents || 0} {course.assessmentCount || 0} {new Date(course.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
)}

Assessment Management

View and manage students enrolled in your courses

 {/* Course Modal */} setShowCourseModal(false)} size="lg"> {editingCourse ? "Edit Course" : "Create New Course"}
Course Title setCourseForm({ ...courseForm, title: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter course title" required /> Description setCourseForm({ ...courseForm, description: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter course description" required /> Course Media URL (Optional) setCourseForm({ ...courseForm, mediaUrl: e.target.value })} placeholder="Enter image URL" /> Upload Course Materials

Drag and drop files here or click to browse

Supported formats: MP4, JPG, PNG, PDF
) } export default InstructorDashboard
